content: of the darker brown round you can omit round 10 fasten_off and weave in ends bassinet bottom with light gray yarn and f hook make magic loop rnd1 single_crochet 5 in magic loop 5 sts rnd2 single_crochet 2 in each single_crochet around 10 sts rnd3 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 5 times 15 sts rnd4 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 5 times 20 sts rnd5 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat 5 times 25 sts rnd6-9 4 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 sts rnd10 bpsc in next 25 single_crochet 25 sts rnd11 single_crochet in next 3 sts decrease repeat 5 times 20 sts fasten_off with tail for sewing to bassinet bottom with tapestry needle sew last round of bassinet top to bassinet bottom across 2 or 3 stitches to create a hinge fasten_off and weave in end for a complete video tutorial see my janageek youtube channel https //youtu be/aiw_hwenw9y
